item.description:
New England Longboard Classic at Nantasket Beach, Hull, MA

Sunday June 12, 2011

Contest Entry Fee is $25 paid in advance to Chick Frodigh (see pdf entry form below)

This is a very FUN, non-competitive competition (does that even make sense?) for old friends and new, riding longboards, in whatever waves are breaking that day for a good time! If there are no waves, expect a paddle contest.

*be prepared with your own equipment. novices are welcome, but there will not be rental equipment available.

There is an after party planned at the Red Parrot, where non-surfers are invited to attend for a $15 fee if space is available (there is a 200 person capacity there).There will be a band, prizes, etc! Good times!

Chick's contact info is in the entry form, make sure and contact him if you are interested in entering the contest or attending the after party to RESERVE YOUR SPOT.

RSVPing here will not reserve your spot. You must contact Chick, the organizer, to pay your entry fee.

Download Event Poster (PDF)

Download Entry Form (PDF)

Download Press Release (PDF)
item.name: New England Longboard Classic
